Package jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.number.lang

Class NumberFormat_BR

java.lang.Object
jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.number.lang.AbstractNumberFormat
jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.number.lang.NumberFormat
jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.number.lang.NumberFormat_ES
jp.co.cam.universal.util.text.format.number.lang.NumberFormat_BR
All Implemented Interfaces:
NumberFormatIF
public class NumberFormat_BR extends NumberFormat_ES
[universal](commons)Provides number format conversion functionality. 
 Federative Republic of Brazil(Type Spain)
 
 The main differences between Germany and France
 Germany 1.000 = 1000
 France  1.000 = 1.0
 This happens because for Germany the separator are dots.
 In addition, French separator are white spaces.
 
 [SAMPLE]
 1,001,000.20 ---- 1001000.2
 1.001.000,20 ---- 1001000.2
 1 001 000,20 ---- 1001000.2
 1 001 000.20 ---- 1001000.2
 1001000,20 ------ 1001000.2
 1001000.20 ------ 1001000.2
 1.000      ------ 1000 (!)caution
 1,000      ------ 1
 1.00       ------ 1
 1,00       ------ 1
